description: Fetches the Value of the given Key from the provided Object.
label: Fetch Object Variable

options.name: object
options.label: Object
options.info: The Object you want to fetch the variable from.

options.name: keyName
options.label: Key Name
options.info: The key that you want to fetch the Value from.

options.name: as
options.label: as
options.info: The name of the variable you want for the fetched veriable.
